name: Salary Man Champ: Tatakau Salary Man
overview: A salaryman is your stereotyped version of the Japanese besuited businessman: hard working, undervalued by the boss and never complaining. The salary man is a busy life too, if Salary Man Champ is to be believed, this fun filled minigame fest is a journey through the life of a salary man, as he strives to be the pinnacle of Japanese society and climbs the corporate staircase. The game consists of a variety of different, mostly odd, minigames. this fun title involves challenges such as curry eating contests, running up stairwells and out running kiss blowing blokes! The game is a conversion of the Arcade Machine by Konami.
